price: 6. Qof yahow! Maxaa kaa jeediyey Rabbigaaga, Roonaanta Badan?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
